name: Madrobot X
description: MadRobot X is an old school shoot 'em up game. You control a robot trying to escape from the laboratory of a mad scientist, and to accomplish this, you'll need the help of GoboGobo, another robot who also wants to escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or later Graphics: DirectX 9 (or later) compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: A nice little Shmup that is plagued by some bad design decision! First of all it felt like an endless runner game to me, because you just fly up a seemingly endless tube just to face one endboss again and again. The enemy variety isn't that great either! Maybe this will change up in later levels, but it couldn't keep me entertained!  Keep in mind that it will only cost you a dollar! There are games around that'll cost you more and are far worse than Madrobot X!  Loved the chiptunes!  Go for it if you're in the mood for a little old school Shmup Snack!
